title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Hi
Macbook A1707 820-00281-A have boot loop with internal KB and TP. But it boots normally without KB and TP. External KB and mouse works fine. I also checked with new Topcase with new KB and TP but still same issue.

There is no liquid damage on the board, looks very neat and clean. I have also checked the J4501 and J4500 diode mode reading couldn't find any clue. compared these diode mode reading with known good working machine which was normal.

please suggest me where to start and what i am missing.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message: Disconnect KB, keep only TP connected; check if still goes into boot loop.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message: yes i tried both one by one, still was doing same boot look.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Try to discard a software issue.
Recover data and do new macOS installation.

BTW, did PRAM reset?

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Did the new MacOS install and PRAM reset as well several times.

No boot loop with Keyboard connected and TP not connected.
but there is no activity on keyboard.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
KB will not work without TP!

Check U4520/40 and Q4530 areas.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
didn't find any issue in that area.
i am getting following values 

Q4530. pin 3- TPAD_SPI_CS_L_Conn- 3.28V

U4540 Pin 4- TPAD_SPI_INT_L- 3.32V

U4520 Pin 4 - TPAD_SPI_IF_Conn- 3.32V

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Check TPAD_SPI_INT_L voltage on working board.
Remember to keep TP connected, when diagnose this problem.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Connected TP only. No KB.
U4540 Pin 4- TPAD_SPI_INT_L- 3.32V

U4520 Pin 4 - TPAD_SPI_IF_Conn- 3.32V

these signal stays at these value. i didn't find any change.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
While only TPAD connected 
these are the values i get
TPAD_SPI_INT_L- 3.32V
TPAD_SPI_IF_Conn- 3.32V
SMBUS_SMC_3SDA-3.32V
TPAD_SPI_CS_L_CONN-5.1v
PP5V4_TPAD_CONN-5.1V
SMC_PME_S4_WAKE_L-3.2V
SMC_ACTUATOR_DISABLE_L-3.2V
KBD_INT_L-3.3V
TPAD_SPI_MOSI-0V
TPAD_SPI_CLK_CONN-0V
KBD_I2C_SCL-0V
KBD_BLC_GSSIN-3.3V
PP3V3_S4_TPAD-3.3V
TPAD_SPI_CLK-0V

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
Your problem seems to be caused by CPU itself.
Without TP/KB machine works, as CPU is clocked to minimum.

Just in case, try clean ME BIOS...

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message:
can i please get the fress bios for this machine?
i tried to download from other sources that is having size problem keep saying does not match the chip size.

message:
No Luck 
tried both but same behaviour.

message: do i Give Up or try something else?

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message: Check if works under WIndows, or Linux at least.

title: MacbookPro A1707 Boot loop with internal KeyBoard and TP
message: Tried installing  Window 10 but no luck same response. Booting properly without TPAD. But when connects TPAD, shut downs in few seconds and reboot.
